content: "prompt": "A split image comparing video length and recording time. On the left side, show a visual representation of 1 second of video with a clock showing 1 second. On the right side, show a visual representation of 30 seconds of recording time, with a clock showing 30 seconds. The 30-second side should appear significantly longer than the 1-second side. Use clear, easy-to-understand visuals, with clocks or timers to highlight the time differences. The background should be simple and neutral to focus on the time contrast.", "size": "1024x1024"
